birthdaySetupTimeZone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: **Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
First, please enter your time zone. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-need-my-timezone)
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then enter it below.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupTimeZoneChange.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: __**Note**__: Your birthday is already set, continue to change it.
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
First, please enter your time zone. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-need-my-timezone)
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then enter it below.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupBirthday.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: **Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
Please enter your birth month and day. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-only-need-my-birth-month-and-date)
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupBirthdayChange.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: __**Note**__: Your birthday is already set, continue to change it.
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
Please enter your birth month and day. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-only-need-my-birth-month-and-date)
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

customMessageClearExpired.description: Type `bday set` to rerun the birthday setup.

blacklistRemoveSuccess.description: Successfully added {{TARGET}} to the birthday blacklist!

addedTrustedRole.description: Successfully added {{ROLE}} as a trusted role!

trustedPreventsMessageYes.description: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday message!

trustedPreventsMessageNo.description: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday message!

trustedPreventsRoleYes.description: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday role!

trustedPreventsRoleNo.description: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday role!

requireAllTrustedYes.description: To have their birthday celebrated users now require all the trusted roles!

requireAllTrustedNo.description: To have their birthday celebrated users now require only one of the trusted roles!

addMessageInvalidType.title: Add Custom Message

removeMessageInvalidType.title: Remove Custom Message
removeMessageInvalidType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

clearMessageInvalidType.title: Clear Custom Message

invalidChannelType.title: Channel Selection
invalidChannelType.description: Please specify a channel type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

invalidChannelAction.title: Channel Selection
description: Please specify an option!
`bday config channel <type> create` - Creates the default channel of that type.
`bday config channel <type> clear` - Clears the channel of that type.
`bday config channel <type> #channel` - Set the channel of that type.

invalidNameFormat.title: Invalid Name Format
description: Accepted Values
`mention (default)`: **{{MENTION}}**
`username`: **{{USERNAME}}**
`nickname`: **{{NICKNAME}}**

invalidMasterAction.title: Birthday Master Role
description: Please specify an option!
`bday config birthdayMasterRole create` - Creates the birthday master role.
`bday config birthdayMasterRole clear` - Clears the birthday master role.
`bday config birthdayMasterRole @role` - Set the birthday master role.

invalidBirthdayRoleAction.title: Birthday Role
description: Please specify an option!
`bday config role create` - Creates the default birthday role.
`bday config role clear` - Clears the birthday role.
`bday config role @role` - Set the birthday role.

invalidUseTimezoneAction.title: Use Time Zone Setting
description: Please select an option:
`server` - Celebrate birthdays based on the server's timezone.
`user` - Celebrate birthdays based on the user's timezone.

invalidServerTimeZone.title: Default Server Timezone Selection
description: Invalid time zone!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!

invalidServerTimeZoneAbbreviation.title: Default Server Timezone Selection
description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!

bot.name: Birthday Bot
bot.description: {{REF:links.templateEmbed}} helps your server track and celebrate birthdays by automatically celebrating them with numerous fun and extremely customizable features.

links.supportEmbed: For support join our discord server [here]({{REF:links.support}})!

footers.tryAgain: Please check above and try again!
footers.whyPremium: Premium helps us support and maintain the bot!

defaults.memberAnniversaryMessage: Congratulations on {{REF:placeHolders.years}} years in the server {{REF:placeholders.users}}!

list.birthdayMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom birthday messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.memberAnniversaryMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom member anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.serverAnniversaryMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom server anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.userBirthdayMessageFieldText: User-specific messages are a premium only feature. Unlock them with `bday premium`!
list.trustedRoleFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** trusted roles. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.memberAnniversaryRoleFieldText: Member anniversary roles are a premium feature **only**. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
